scripts.build: tsc && cp -R src/config dist/ && cp -R src/db dist/ && find dist -name '*.ts' -type f -delete
scripts.pgadmin:start: sudo apt update && sudo apt install wslu && bash -c 'echo "Email: ${PGADMIN_DEFAULT_EMAIL:-admin@example.com}" && echo "Password: ${PGADMIN_DEFAULT_PASSWORD:-admin}" && echo "URL: http://localhost:8080" && wslview http://localhost:8080'
scripts.pg:setup: npm run pg:stop && npm run pg:start && npm run pgadmin:start && npm run get-postgres-ip
